auth.loginSubtitle: Welcome to Love to Fly Portal

dashboard.noNews: No news available at the moment

navigation.name: Air Navigation
navigation.description: Essential tools for flight planning and execution with precision
navigation.e6b: Classic air navigation calculator. Convert between units, calculate flight time, required fuel, correct wind drift and solve real navigation problems
navigation.glasscockpit: Advanced flight deck simulator with modern avionics. Practice procedures, system operation and instrumentation in a realistic environment
navigation.ifr: Specialized instrument flight simulator. Develop IFR skills, practice instrument approaches and emergency procedures
navigation.flightplan: Plan complete routes, calculate required fuel, optimal altitudes, flight time and operational costs. Generate automatic briefing

weather.name: Aeronautical Meteorology
weather.description: Accurate and updated meteorological information for safe flight decisions
weather.metar: Real-time weather condition queries for any airport. Automatic decoding, critical condition alerts and 48-hour history
weather.radar: Real-time weather radar with storm cell movement projection. Essential tool for safe routing

training.name: Training & Certification
training.description: Continuous skills development through courses, logbook and simulated practice
training.logbook: Complete record of all your flight hours with categories, automatic statistics briefing and export for certifications
training.courses: Course catalog for pilots on various topics: procedures, ANAC regulations, aerodynamics, meteorology and more
training.simulator: Access to professional simulator for training, emergency procedure practice and skills maintenance

community.name: Aviation Community
community.description: Connect with pilots, share knowledge and trade equipment
community.forum: Space for technical discussions, experience sharing and questions with experienced pilots and instructors
community.marketplace: Buy and sell aeronautical equipment such as headsets, charts, manuals, software and pilot accessories

career.name: Career Opportunities
career.description: Find job openings, develop your career and connect with aviation mentors
career.jobs: Exclusive access to aviation job opportunities: airline pilots, private, agricultural, instructors and more
career.mentoring: Connect with experienced pilots and aviation professionals for career guidance, interview tips and networking

hangarshare.name: HangarShare - Hangar Rental
hangarshare.description: Complete platform for renting hangars at Brazilian airfields
hangarshare.search: Reserve hangars at Brazilian airdromes with competitive prices. Filter by size, type and location. Instant and secure booking
hangarshare.advertise: Monetize your idle space by renting to other pilots. Receive reservations, manage payments and track revenue in real-time
hangarshare.bookings: Manage all your active and historical reservations, track invoices and communicate directly with owners

weatherPage.infoTaf: Weather forecast for the next hours
weatherPage.infoUpdated: Information updated automatically by official agencies

transfers.heroSubtitle: Complete planning, experienced team, and end-to-end monitoring in Brazil.

services.deliveryDescription: Safe transfer to a new hangar, operating base, or final destination.
services.maintenanceDescription: Full logistics coordination for MRO and return.
services.ferryDescription: Documentation management and execution with compliance focus.

transfers.ownersSubtitle: Request a transfer with full planning, compliance, and dedicated follow-up.
transfers.pilotsSubtitle: Learn the requirements and onboarding flow to join transfers.
transfers.securityItem2: Qualified crew aligned with the operation.
transfers.ctaSubtitle: Receive a tailored proposal within 48‚Äì72 business hours after complete submission.
transfers.formSubtitle: Provide essential details so we can begin the technical review. Fields marked with * are required.
transfers.formSuccess: Request submitted. Our team will return with a proposal within 72 business hours.

form.ownerAuthorizationLabel: I confirm I have the owner's authorization to request this transfer.
form.disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to the use of information for request analysis.

transfers.disclaimer: Transfer execution is subject to documentation validation, airworthiness, and operational conditions. Timelines may vary due to weather, availability, and applicable authorizations. The portal acts as a connector between contractor and pilot, providing information and status ‚Äî the operation is the responsibility of the parties.
transfers.statusIntro: Track and update the operation status at

faq.q1: How long does a transfer take?
faq.a1: Timing varies by route and availability, with response SLA within 72 business hours.
faq.a2: Registration, airworthiness, updated logs, and owner authorization.
faq.a3: Yes, we send status updates throughout the operation.
faq.q4: What if the aircraft isn't airworthy?
faq.a4: We will indicate the necessary adjustments before proceeding.

transfersOwners.heroSubtitle: Complete transfer management with regulatory compliance, technical planning, and dedicated communication.
transfersOwners.heroDisclaimer: The portal connects contractor and pilot. The operation is the responsibility of the parties.

cards.planningDescription: Route, performance, fuel, and alternates aligned to the operation.
cards.complianceDescription: Airworthiness checklists, authorizations, and up-to-date records.
cards.monitoringDescription: Status updated throughout the operation with final report.

transfersOwners.documentsItem3: Owner authorization to execute the transfer.
transfersOwners.documentsItem4: Hangar/handling information at origin and destination.
transfersOwners.monitoringBody: Contractor and pilot provide status updates: operation start, flight data, stopovers, arrivals, and interruptions due to technical or weather reasons.
transfersOwners.monitoringNote: The portal only records and displays this information, without operational responsibility.
transfersOwners.messagesBody: All negotiations must take place in the portal to ensure the service fee. Personal contacts are automatically blocked.
transfersOwners.availablePilotsSubtitle: List of approved pilots for national transfers. Validate documentation before hiring.
transfersOwners.emptyPilots: No approved pilots at the moment.
transfersOwners.readySubtitle: Use the full form on the main transfers page to submit your request.

transfersPilots.heroSubtitle: Register to work on transfers with a focus on safety, punctuality, and compliance.
transfersPilots.heroDisclaimer: The portal connects pilots and contractors. The operation is the responsibility of the parties involved.

cards.requirementsDescription: Licenses and ratings compatible with the aircraft type.

transfersPilots.prereqItem1: Valid licenses and ratings for the operation profile.
transfersPilots.prereqItem2: Experience compatible with the aircraft category.
transfersPilots.messagesBody: All communication with the contractor happens in the portal. External contacts are removed automatically.
transfersPilots.formSubtitle: Fill in your details and upload documentation for validation. Fields marked with * are required.
transfersPilots.formSuccess: Registration submitted. Our team will validate your documents.

formErrors.requiredDocuments: Upload the license and medical certificate.

transfersPilots.ctaSubtitle: Send your interest and receive instructions for full registration.

transfersMessages.title: Transfer Messages
transfersMessages.subtitle: All communication must happen here. Personal contacts are removed automatically to protect the portal fee.
transfersMessages.agreementSubtitle: Confirm when both parties decide to proceed with the transfer. After confirmation, the portal fee must be paid.
transfersMessages.paymentAfterAgreement: Payment is only available after both parties confirm the agreement.

notice.redacted: Some contacts were automatically removed from the message.

errors.protocolInvalid: Enter a valid protocol, for example TR-3.

transfersStatus.title: Operation status
transfersStatus.subtitle: Contractor and pilot update the transfer progress. The portal only records the information.

errors.protocolAndMessageRequired: Enter the protocol and status message.
